entry.title: Making a new blog with Docusaurus v2
entry.id: Making a new blog with Docusaurus v2
entry.summary: To make a new blog with the upcoming Docusaurus 2, we need understand how GitHub Pages works, and also pay attention to several caveats.

entry.title: Problem with inotifywait, VSCode, and Maven
entry.id: Problem with inotifywait, VSCode, and Maven
entry.summary: When doing some Java development on VSCode, I wanted to use inotifywait to watch for source file changes and automatically build the project when a source file is changed.
